mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS orderId,o.orderCode,o.orderStatus,sc.sysName AS orderStatusDesc,o.rentTime,o.returnTime, o.rentSpId,s1.spName AS rentSpName,s1.spLat AS rentSpLat,s1.spLng AS rentSpLng, o.rentSpId,s1.spName AS rentSpName,s1.spLat AS rentSpLat,s1.spLng AS rentSpLng, o.returnSpId,s2.spName AS returnSpName,s2.spLat AS returnSpLat,s2.spLng AS returnSpLng, o.deviceId,o.userId,o.totalFee,o.balance FROM t_eds_order o LEFT JOIN t_eds_sp s1 ON o.rentSpId = s1.id LEFT JOIN t_eds_sp s2 ON o.returnSpId = s2.id LEFT JOIN t_b_sys_code sc ON o.orderStatus = sc.sysCode WHERE o.id = #{orderId} AND o.userId = #{userId} AND o.dataStatus = 1
SELECT o.id FROM t_eds_order o WHERE o.userId = #{userId} AND o.orderStatus = 'S_DDZT_JXZ' AND o.dataStatus = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE t_eds_order o SET o.returnTime=#{returnTime},o.returnSpId =#{spId}, o.orderStatus = 'S_DDZT_YJS',o.balance = #{balance},o.totalFee = #{totalFee} WHERE o.id=#{orderId} AND o.deviceId = #{deviceId} and o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderStatus = 'S_DDZT_JXZ'
